recipe.name: Margherita Pizza
recipe.ingredients: Tomatoes, Mozzarella Cheese, Basil, Olive Oil, Salt
recipe.instructions: Preheat the oven to 450°F. Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface. Spread olive oil over the dough. Add the tomato sauce and spread evenly. Add the mozzarella cheese and basil. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
